mission.title: Mission
mission.p1: The Information Technology Services’ mission is to ensure the proper functioning of all infrastructure and technologies that support the services provided by IPVC, whether internal or external.
mission.p2: It is also part of the IT Services’ mission to foster the ideas and projects of the IPVC community (internal or external), creating the conditions for them to operate and grow.
mission.p3: The IT Services are a facilitating element in the implementation of technologies so that the information society exists in Alto Minho and for the world.
